name: BlackBell
description:
our team of 5 members used every tool and expertise they had to make sure a very refined and optimized project gets delivered in 7 days at the time of game jam. it was challenging and fun 

we develop this game using lyra project and tried to utilize lyra for android usage. this proved challenging and some features like EOS based multiplayer could not be delivered. but you can play it offline or with your friends over Lan (remember to use one wifi)

also, we developed an optimized UE5 HISM technique for our destruction on mobile games which we will develop further

this game came to life with the epic mega jam and while we were brain storming different ideas we decided to build something that felt different and fresh for android games

We will probably turn this project to Black bell 2 after our first game Black Bell Tactical because we saw potential in this game that we build on game jam and will develop this project furthermore.
